verbose_text: In our study, although the mean life span reduction through the expression of either a Babo RNAi or a Smox RNAi transgene showed some sex differences, there is, nevertheless, an overall trend towards a shorter lifespan when these common Activin signal transduction components are knocked down either ubiquitously in adults (XREF_FIG A, B) or in muscle tissues only (XREF_FIG G).
evidence: expression of either a Babo RNAi or a Smox
